item.content:encoded:
Funeral Our Lady Memorial Prayer Sympathy Cards

Top 10! Funeral Our Lady Memorial Prayer Sympathy Cards – Sympathy Cards Funeral Our Lady Memorial Prayer Sympathy Cards products are in stock Funeral Our Lady Memorial Prayer Sympathy Cards quality products Sacred Remembrance: Vintage Our Lady of Grace Funeral Prayer Card

In honor of your departed loved one, we present our heartfelt Vintage Our Lady of Grace Funeral Prayer Card, featuring a beautiful vintage image of Our Lady of Grace on the front. This timeless depiction of the Blessed Virgin Mary exudes grace and compassion, offering solace and comfort during times of mourning.

Embrace Divine Comfort: Amidst the sorrowful journey of loss, find solace in the comforting embrace of divine love. Our prayer card serves as a beacon of hope, guiding grieving hearts toward peace and serenity through the intercession of Our Lady of Grace.

Personalized Tribute: The front of the card showcases a vintage image of Our Lady of Grace, surrounded by an aura of divine light and grace. On the back, there’s ample space for easy personalization, allowing you to honor your loved one’s memory with their name and dates.

Eternal Blessings: On the back of the card, a beautiful watercolor illustration of flowers and a cross provides a serene backdrop for prayers and reflections. This symbolic imagery evokes the beauty of eternal life and the promise of spiritual renewal.

Graceful Remembrance: Just as Our Lady of Grace bestows her blessings upon all who seek her intercession, may the memory of your loved one be a source of grace and inspiration, guiding you through moments of remembrance and reflection.

Heartfelt Thanks: Express your gratitude for the love and support received during this time of loss with a personalized message of thanks on the back of the card. This heartfelt expression of appreciation honors the bonds of love and friendship that sustain us in our time of need.

Guiding Light: As you hold this prayer card in your hands, may it serve as a guiding light, leading you toward healing and peace. May it also serve as a symbol of gratitude for the love shared and the memories cherished.

Embrace the legacy of grace and compassion with our Vintage Our Lady of Grace Funeral Prayer Card: a tribute to the enduring love and blessings accompanying us on life’s journey. Price:$46.15

Top 10! Funeral Our Lady Memorial Prayer Sympathy Cards ($46.15)
